syllabusDesc: The Full stack software development course with a 100% Job Guarantee is curated by leading faculties and industry leaders. Especially, with the aim to provide practical learning experience with live interactive classes and projects.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Programming Fundamentals(2 week )

Module0.desc: We help you to work on projects directly with startups so that you get real work experience. You will be building scalable tech products from scratch using full stack technologies and advanced system design concepts. You are recommended to work on minimum 3-4 projects end to end and build a project portfolio to crack coding interviews in top MNCs with confidence.

FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQ’s to know more about our Full Stack AI and ML program in Mumbai, project details of artificial intelligence course in  Mumbai with placement and course fees.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the various learning options offered under the Full Stack AI and ML program in Mumbai?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, we offer both offline and online learning choices for our artificial intelligence course in Mumbai. Aside from that, we provide a blended learning program designed specifically for working professionals. In addition, you can participate in live online sessions in hybrid learning mode under our Full Stack AI and ML program in Mumbai. Besides, you will also be performing some hands-on work on the industrial project site. That said, we can only offer fully online classes via live sessions due to the outbreak. This means you can talk to your instructor in real time, just like in a traditional face-to-face session. Additionally, at this time, all practical sessions of our artificial intelligence and machine learning courses in Mumbai will be conducted using cloud-based services.

FaqDATA.ques: Will there be a make-up session available if I have to miss a class of ai ml courses in Mumbai?
FaqDATA.ans: Firstly, we offer live online classes for ai ml courses in Mumbai. Also, all of our students have access to recorded versions of those classes. In addition, we also give you unlimited access to these recorded sessions, so you can go back to them whenever you need theoretical help in your AI and ML career. As a result, you need not be disappointed if you miss any of the live classes under our artificial intelligence course in Mumbai. However, we strongly advise you to participate in all live classes.

FaqDATA.ques: What if I did not understand an entire module? Will I be able to repeat the class?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, if you do not understand an entire module under the Full Stack AI and ML program in Mumbai, you can repeat the same class with another batch. Thus, leaving no chance for you to remain in confusion about the learning modules.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any fee discounts available for ai ml courses in Mumbai?
FaqDATA.ans: If you are considered eligible for a scholarship, you may be able to save up to 10% on your fees for ai courses in Mumbai. Moreover, we also offer scholarships to Covid-affected candidates, unemployed candidates, and mothers returning to the workforce after a vacation.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does the Full Stack AI and ML program in Mumbai provide?
FaqDATA.ans: The hitch is that if you take the artificial and machine learning courses in Mumbai, you will not just obtain any ordinary type of certification or academic degree. Instead, we offer a globally recognized project management certificate. The firm with which you completed your industrial project can also give you direct certifications.
